name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：アナコンダ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Anakonda

abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into an anaconda or anaconda-human hybrid. The hybrid form grants increased size, strength, and the ability to constrict opponents.
abilities.limitations: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses - inability to swim, vulnerability to Seastone

abilities.description: The user can control their hair and shape it into multiple snakes, using them like a hydra to attack opponents with fangs strong as steel that can crush stone.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Seastone

keyMoments.description: Boa Sandersonia transforms into her anaconda hybrid form for the first time on-screen, revealing the 'Gorgon curse' is actually a Devil Fruit power.
keyMoments.significance: Debunks the Kuja's belief in the Gorgon curse and introduces a new Zoan type to the series.

trivia: This Devil Fruit was force-fed to Sandersonia by Celestial Dragons as cruel entertainment when she was enslaved as a child.
The Kuja tribe believes the transformation is a curse from defeating the mythical Gorgon, not knowing about Devil Fruits.

name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：キングコブラ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Kingu Kobura

abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into a King Cobra or King Cobra-human hybrid. The hybrid form grants increased size, strength, and the ability to use the tail for binding and striking.
abilities.limitations: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses - inability to swim, vulnerability to Seastone

abilities.description: In snake form, the user appears incredibly resilient and can go completely unharmed even after lighting themselves on fire.
A special transformation state that combines the snake powers with fire, creating what the Kuja call the 'Salamander' form.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Seastone

keyMoments.description: Boa Marigold transforms into her King Cobra hybrid form, demonstrating the snake Zoan abilities alongside her sister.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals another aspect of the 'Gorgon curse' legend and introduces the King Cobra Zoan variant.

trivia: This Devil Fruit was force-fed to Marigold by Celestial Dragons as cruel entertainment when she was enslaved as a child.
The King Cobra form is called 'Salamander' by the Kuja due to its fire-based attacks and appearance.
